1625700.name: The Chatters Show
1625700.description:
The Chatters Show is designed for Twitch streamers and their chats. Create questions sets and play with your chat to see who is the smartest person.

  • Create any question set you desire
  • Share and edit any question set with your community
  • Smooth connection to Twitch chat
  • Up to 4 different chats can play at the same time
  • Download dozens of premade question sets from the get go


    IMPORTANT: if you are a passionate viewer or member of a community and you want to create a question set for your streamer to play. Note that a free version of the game which allows for question set creation will come to the store in July
